ai-tika-abh09t10:38_0: One has finished the five concludeds, ‘Four salts of the swords, showers indiants, a once-returner, and a non-returner. Of these five classes of sensual stimulation, and these are the disciples of the perfected one. And I need to enjoy extinguishment in this way.’
ai-tika-abh09t10:38_1: sensual pleasures are extinguished in the past, and they don’t appear.
ai-tika-abh09t10:38_2: here in the midst of the five lower fetters they’re extinguished between one life and the next ... they’re extinguished upon landing ... they’re extinguished without extra effort ... they’re extinguished with extra effort ... they head upstream, going to the Akaniṭṭha realm.
ai-tika-abh09t10:38_5: don’t get caught up in the eight emancipations.
ai-tika-abh09t10:38_6: he should not take a value of a golden garland.
ai-tika-abh09t10:40_0: And whereas, should be finished by people
